examples.description: Open a long position on BTC perpetual futures
examples.note: Amount is a percentage of available balance. Sends 10% of your available USDT (scaled by leverage and contract size)

examples.description: Close a long position on BTC perpetual futures
examples.note: Closes 0.01 BTC of the long position (partial close)

examples.description: Open a short position on BTC perpetual futures
examples.note: Uses 10% of available balance (after leverage) to determine how many contracts to sell short

examples.description: Close a short position on BTC perpetual futures
examples.note: Closes 0.01 BTC of the short position by buying back contracts
